description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
year the data point was obtained
month the data point was obtained
day of the month the data point was obtained
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study – chimpanzee / gorilla
presentation of the experiment to the participants – 1 /2/3/4/ training (for gorilla participants)
the object or picture  on the left side - banana  / photo_banana /pebble/  photo_pebble / (p or b in the training session)
the object or picture  on the right side -banana  / photo_banana /pebble/  photo_pebble / (p or b in the training session)
choice participants made - banana/ photo_banana /pebble/  photo_pebble / ( / =  did not point)
notes on the choices participant made e.g. did_not_point/ did_not_take_it
